name: forese
description: The official website of the FORum for Economic Studies by Engineers (FORESE)

scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin img/members/2nd/* -o dist/img/members/2nd && imagemin img/members/3rd/* -o dist/img/members/3rd && imagemin img/members/4th/* -o dist/img/members/4th && imagemin img/mockimg/ -o dist/img/mockimg
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin aptitudeTest.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aptitudeTest.html && usemin groupDiscussion.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/groupDiscussion.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Nilesh D
